detail_desc: Short, straight dress in jersey with long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button placket, open chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with elastication and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sandals in imitation suede with vinyl foot straps and a narrow, adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation suede insoles.

Short, straight-cut dress in a chunky weave with glittery details and a small stand-up collar. Concealed zip at the back, long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and cuffs.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with flounces at the top in a broderie anglaise weave.

Longer-style shirt jacket in soft fleece with a collar and covered press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets, discreet pocket in one side seam, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with cuffs with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Patterned swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in soft, textured-knit cotton with decorative appliqués, embroidery and ribbed cuffs. Jersey lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Short skirt in imitation leather with decorative metal eyelets at the front and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Pyjamas in patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Soft twill tunic with a collar, metal buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with metal buttons. Seam at the waist with a drawstring, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Fitted top in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Wide, straight trousers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and back pockets. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length lace dress in a straight cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with box pleats front and back for added volume. Jersey lining.
Fitted top in a ribbed cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Sleeveless lace dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a lace-trimmed hem. Jersey-lined bodice and sewn-in inner skirt.
Narrow Alice bands in various designs. One glittery, one with pearly plastic beads and one covered in satin with a decorative bow.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Checked shirt in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Embroidered text at the top and at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Tunic in airy pima cotton poplin with a wrapover V-neck and dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves, wide cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Hi-top trainers in glittery and shimmering imitation leather with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted T-shirt in sturdy slub jersey.
Wide, ankle-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with decorative ties at the top, and a slit at the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
Long, A-line dress in a cotton weave with a low-cut back and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back. Close gathers at the top for added volume and movement. Lining in a cotton weave.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Size approx. 16x21 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Trainers in imitation suede and mesh with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Joggers in two different colours of washed denim. Elasticated drawstring waist, one back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Cotton twill shorts in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Platform hi-tops in cotton canvas with lacing and a tongue at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with embroidered hearts. Narrow, covered elastication and a decorative, twisted drawstring at the waist, and scalloped hems.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft stretch pima cotton jersey with a wide neckline and long sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in printed cotton jersey. The shorts have an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Non-wired nursing bra in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Trainers in moulded scuba with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, fixed elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 7.5 cm.
Hair claw in metal with a cut-out pattern.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
